title: Ensure WHY STOP MUSIC GROUP logo uses uploaded logo2-1.png (no logo2.png references)
constraints: Use the uploaded logo file logo2-1.png for both the center hub logo and the background silhouette logo.
Do not reference logo2.png anywhere in the project for these logo bindings.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Changing the theatre/stage scene visuals, layout, sizing, z-index layering, halo/orbit ring styling, or any other existing styling unrelated to swapping logo assets.
Adding new logo variants or placeholder/substitute images.
